articles.title: Biden opposes Nippon Steel's US Steel takeover plans - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Joe Biden is opposing the planned sale of U.S. Steel to Nippon Steel of Japan. Biden says in a statement obtained by The Associated Press the U.S. needs "strong American steel companies powered by American steel workers.” The announcement expected T…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Joe Biden is coming out in opposition to the planned sale of U.S. Steel to Nippon Steel of Japan, saying in a statement to be released Thursday that the U.S. needs to mainta… [+3695 chars]

articles.title: Gerrit Cole not only pitcher to face woes a year after winning Cy Young - New York Post

articles.title: Astronomy's big event: Rare solar eclipse to occur in April 2024 after 126 years - The Times of India
articles.description: The April 8, 2024 total solar eclipse over North America is not just a stunning spectacle but also a rare scientific opportunity. With its path of totality stretching from Mexico to Canada, it promises longer duration and darker skies than previous eclipses. …

articles.author: TN National Desk
articles.title: Pitbull, Bulldog, Rottweiler and More: Centre Orders States To Ban 23 'Ferocious' Dog Breeds - Times Now
articles.description: The Central Government has issued directives to all states to ban the sale and breeding of "ferocious" dog breeds. This list of dog breeds includes breeds such as Pitbull Terrier, American Bulldog, Rottweiler and more.
articles.content: Pitbull, Bulldog, Rottweiler and More: Centre Orders State To Ban 23 'Ferocious' Dog Breeds
